docu_nopro.description: Generate human-friendly "Explain-for-humans" comments for non-technical audiences
docu_nopro.purpose: Create accessible documentation for stakeholders and non-developers (Requires a configured AI provider. Set one up with 'woaru ai setup'.)

docu_pro.description: Generate technical TSDoc/JSDoc documentation for developers
docu_pro.purpose: Create detailed technical documentation following industry standards (Requires a configured AI provider. Set one up with 'woaru ai setup'.)

docu_ai.description: Generate machine-readable YAML context headers optimized for AI comprehension
docu_ai.purpose: Create AI-optimized documentation for better code understanding (Requires a configured AI provider. Set one up with 'woaru ai setup'.)

ignore.description: Add a tool to the ignore list
ignore.purpose: Exclude specific tools from recommendations and monitoring

review.purpose: Comprehensive code quality and security analysis

review_ai.description: AI-powered code review and analysis using multiple AI providers
review_ai.purpose: Get intelligent code insights using advanced AI analysis (Requires a configured AI provider. Set one up with 'woaru ai setup'.)

review_git.description: Analyze changes since a specific branch (git diff)
review_git.purpose: Review changes in your git working directory

review_git_ai.description: AI-powered analysis of git changes using multiple AI providers
review_git_ai.purpose: Get intelligent insights on your code changes (Requires a configured AI provider. Set one up with 'woaru ai setup'.)

review_local.description: Analyze current directory or specified path without git dependencies
review_local.purpose: Review code quality without requiring git integration

review_local_git.description: Analyze uncommitted changes in git working directory
review_local_git.purpose: Review your pending changes before committing

review_local_ai.description: AI-powered analysis of current directory using multiple AI providers
review_local_ai.purpose: Get AI-powered insights on your current codebase (Requires a configured AI provider. Set one up with 'woaru ai setup'.)

review_path.purpose: Focus analysis on specific parts of your codebase

review_path_ai.description: AI-powered analysis of specific files or directories using multiple AI providers
review_path_ai.purpose: Get targeted AI analysis for specific code areas (Requires a configured AI provider. Set one up with 'woaru ai setup'.)

analyze.description: Comprehensive project analysis including security audit
analyze.purpose: Perform deep analysis of your project's health and security

analyze_ai.description: AI-powered comprehensive code analysis using multiple AI providers
analyze_ai.purpose: Get intelligent comprehensive analysis of your entire project (Requires a configured AI provider. Set one up with 'woaru ai setup'.)

rollback.description: Rollback changes made by a specific tool
rollback.purpose: Undo changes made by WOARU tools and configurations

security_analysis.gitleaks_not_installed: Gitleaks not installed. Skipping secret detection.
security_analysis.semgrep_not_available: Semgrep not available, using pattern-based analysis.

version_manager.up_to_date: ‚úÖ You are using the latest version (v{{version}})

method_count.explanation: Classes with many methods often have multiple responsibilities. The Single Responsibility Principle states that a class should have only one reason to change.
method_count.impact: Hard to test, understand and maintain. High probability of bugs when making changes.
method_count.suggestion: Split class {{className}} into smaller, focused classes. Group related methods into separate services or utility classes.

complexity.explanation: High cyclomatic complexity indicates too many different logic paths in a class, violating the SRP.
complexity.impact: Hard to test (many test cases needed), error-prone, hard to understand.
complexity.suggestion: Extract complex logic into separate methods or classes. Use design patterns like Strategy or Command to reduce complexity.

concern_diversity.explanation: Imports from different areas (Database, HTTP, Filesystem, Email, etc.) indicate that the class has multiple responsibilities.
concern_diversity.impact: High coupling, hard to test (many mocks needed), changes in one area can affect others.
concern_diversity.suggestion: Separate the different concerns into their own services: {{concernServices}}. Use dependency injection to coordinate these services.

class_size.explanation: Very large classes are often an indicator of multiple responsibilities and violate the Single Responsibility Principle.
class_size.impact: Hard to navigate, understand and maintain. High probability of merge conflicts.
class_size.suggestion: Refactor class {{className}} into smaller, cohesive units. Identify logical groups of methods and extract them into separate classes.

method_parameters.explanation: Methods with many parameters often indicate that they do too many different things and violate the SRP.
method_parameters.impact: Hard to use, error-prone (parameter order), hard to test.
method_parameters.suggestion: Group related parameters into an object or split method {{methodName}} into smaller, more specific methods.

file_class_count.explanation: Files with many classes often indicate that related but different responsibilities are mixed in one file.
file_class_count.impact: Hard to navigate, unclear structure, merge conflicts more likely.
file_class_count.suggestion: Split file {{fileName}}: one file per class or group only truly closely related classes together.

summary.security_warnings: ‚ö†Ô∏è WARNING: {{critical}} critical and {{high}} high security vulnerabilities found!

solid.systematic_refactoring: üèóÔ∏è Perform systematic refactoring - start with the most critical SOLID violations
solid.high_complexity_classes: üîÑ {{count}} classes with high complexity - extract complex logic into separate utility classes
solid.files_with_violations: ‚ö†Ô∏è {{count}} files with many SOLID violations - prioritize these for architectural overhaul
solid.check_documentation: üìö Check the SOLID principles documentation for additional improvement ideas

code_smell.reduce_complexity: üîÑ Reduce cyclomatic complexity in {{count}} functions by splitting
code_smell.shorten_functions: üìè Shorten {{count}} overly long functions by extracting logic

ai_review.high_costs: üí∞ High AI costs - consider batch processing for large codebases
